companyStory.title: Our Story
content: Evolux Group was born from the vision of specialists with decades of experience in the import market, who identified the need for a more strategic and personalized approach to connect international suppliers to the Brazilian market.

With over 40 years of combined experience, our team has developed deep knowledge of the unique challenges and opportunities of the Brazilian market, especially in the segments of household utilities, decoration and home products.
Today, we are recognized as strategic partners of major importers and retailers, offering not only products, but complete solutions that drive the growth and profitability of our customers.
